Package de.frankfurt.uni.vcp.net

Class Summary
GameInfo This class holds data about the current state of the game It contains fields for every info-parameter, the server reports about a specific game.
Info This is the base class, from which all other network relevant information datastructures are inherited.
MapPreview  
MessageInfo This class holds data about the chat messages in the game It contains fields for every parameter, the server reports along with the message itself.
TCPClient This class implements the network capabilities required by a game client Request und server replies will automatically checked for correctness according to the protocol specification.
TypeInfo This class holds data about the unit types available in the game It contains fields for every info-parameter, the server reports about a specific unit.
UnitInfo This class holds data about a specific unit in the game It contains fields for every info-parameter, the server reports about this unit.
 

Enum Summary
GameInfo.GameStatus Represents the values that our representation of a game status can have
GameInfo.TradeStatus Represents the values that our representation of a trade status can have
 

Exception Summary
ProtocolError This class is used for networking Exception handling An Exception of type ProtocolError will be thrown, whenever the client receives a package, that doesn't seem to conform to the game protocol specification.
StatusError This class is used for networking Exception handling An Exception of type StatusError will be thrown, whenever the client receives a package, that according to the protocol specification reports an error.
